creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: bound book with blue cover; text with a few images including a woman playing a lute with man looking on; man and woman sneaking past a screen with bamboo and attendant; and men carrying a palanquin

portfolio: From Red and White Tale of Genji (Kōhaku Genji monogatari 紅白源氏物語)
title: Red and White Tale of Genji, vol. 3b: Autumn Excursion
